org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery

Interface DiscoveryMetricsProvider


  • @GridToStringExclude
public interface DiscoveryMetricsProvider
    Provides metrics to discovery SPI. It is responsibility of discovery SPI to make sure that all nodes have updated metrics data about each other.

    Ignite implementation will supply discovery SPI with metrics provider via DiscoverySpi.setMetricsProvider(DiscoveryMetricsProvider) method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<Integer,CacheMetrics> cacheMetrics()
      Returns metrics data about all caches on local node.
      ClusterMetrics metrics()
      This method always returns up-to-date metrics data about local node.

    • Method Detail

      • metrics

        This method always returns up-to-date metrics data about local node.
        Returns:
        Up to date metrics data about local node.

      • cacheMetrics

        Returns metrics data about all caches on local node.
